Tweet: ‘Ksheera Dhare’ & ‘Ksheera Bhagya’ are among our most successful programmes, that have brought in a dairy revolution benefitting farmers, cooperatives & school children alike.   While others talk, Karnataka delivers.   #NammaKaamKiBaat #CongressMathomme    https://t.co/IIJbE1G4rh
